languages.text: {n}Заглянув в ящик, вы видите знакомый блеск — голодный до крови блеск оружейной {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}пластали{/g}, начищенной и готовой убивать. Старик подпирал спиной несколько новеньких авторужей, завернутых в промасленные тряпки.{/n}

{n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Заглянув в ящик, вы видите знакомый блеск — голодный до крови блеск оружейной {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}пластали{/g}, начищенной и готовой убивать. Старик подпирал спиной несколько новеньких авторужей, завернутых в промасленные тряпки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You look into the box and see a familiar gleam — the bloodthirsty gleam of weapons-grade plasteel, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand new heavy machine guns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

{n}You look into the box and see a familiar gleam — the bloodthirsty gleam of weapons-grade plasteel, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand new heavy machine guns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

{n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — the bloodthirsty gleam of weapons-grade plasteel, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new heavy machine guns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

{n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — the bloodthirsty gleam of weapons-grade plasteel, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new heavy machine guns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

{n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

{n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade plasteel, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

{n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al mirar la caja, ves un brillo conocido: el del {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plastiacero{/g} para armas, pulido y preparado para matar. El anciano estaba inclinado sobre unos rifles automáticos totalmente nuevos envueltos en trapos grasientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al mirar la caja, ves un brillo conocido: el del plastiacero para armas, pulido y preparado para matar. El anciano estaba inclinado sobre unas ametralladoras pesadas totalmente nuevas envueltas en trapos grasientos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}木箱の中を覗き込むと、見慣れた輝きが目に飛び込んできた。磨き上げられ、殺傷能力を備えた武器級{g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}プラスチール{/g}の輝きだ。老人がもたれかかっているのは、油汚れの布に包まれた、新品のオートガンだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}木箱の中を覗き込むと、見慣れた輝きが目に飛び込んできた。磨き上げられ、殺傷能力を備えた不器用プラスチールだ。老人がもたれかかっているのは、脂ぎったボロ布に包まれた、真新しく思いスタッバーだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你看着箱子，箱子里熟悉的光芒引起了你的注意。那是{g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}塑钢{/g}做成的武器发出的反光，武器经过充分抛光，随时都可以杀人。老人原本倚着的东西，实际上是几把崭新的自动枪，包裹在油腻的破布之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看着箱子，箱子里熟悉的光芒引起了你的注意。那是塑钢做成的武器发出的反光，武器经过充分抛光，随时都可以杀人。老人原本倚着的东西，实际上是几把崭新的重型伐木枪，包裹在油腻的破布之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du siehst in die Kiste und erblickst ein vertrautes Schimmern – waffenfähiger {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}Plaststahl{/g}, poliert und bereit zum Töten. Der alte Mann lehnte an mehreren brandneuen Sturmgewehren, die in schmierige Lumpen eingewickelt sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst in die Kiste und erblickst ein vertrautes Schimmern – waffenfähiger Plaststahl, poliert und bereit zum Töten. Der alte Mann lehnte an mehreren brandneuen Maschinengewehren, die in schmierige Lumpen eingewickelt sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De la caisse vous parvient la lueur familière du {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plastacier{/g}. Celui-ci, de qualité militaire, a été poli à l'extrême et est même prêt à tuer. Le vieil homme s'adossait contre plusieurs fusils d'assaut flambant neufs enveloppés dans des chiffons graisseux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De la caisse vous parvient la lueur familière du plastacier. Celui-ci, de qualité militaire, a été poli à l'extrême et est même prêt à tuer. Le vieil homme s'adossait contre plusieurs mitrailleuses lourdes flambant neuves enveloppées dans des chiffons graisseux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kasanın içine bakıyor ve tanıdık bir parıltı görüyorsun. Bu parıltı, cilalanmış ve öldürmeye hazır {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasçelik{/g} silahlardan geliyor. İhtiyar adam; yağa bulanmış paçavralara sarılmış, yepyeni ototüfeklere yaslanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You look into the crate and see a familiar gleam — that of weapons-grade {g|Encyclopedia:Plasteel}plasteel{/g}, polished and ready to kill. The old man was leaning against several brand-new autoguns wrapped in greasy rags.{/n}
